alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Cullman; Franklin; Lawrence; Marshall; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 26 at 7:49AM CST until February 27 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibilities less than 1/4 of a mile are expected in areas of dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected on Monday. * WHERE...Colbert, Franklin AL, Lawrence, Morgan, Marshall and Cullman Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility this morning. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects on Monday. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Colbert; Cullman; Franklin; Lawrence; Marshall; Morgan
